name: Spirit RPG
description:
Spirit RPG is a prototype for a game we worked on around 2015. Play as Aspen and Hazel as they befriend spirits, in an attempt to save their home world.

Gaining Allies

In order to befriend a spirit, you have to reach an accord with them – while making sure no one falls in battle! Enjoy this caring take on a traditional turn-based JRPG system, where Mana is transferred through your actions rather than depleted, and no one is trying to defeat each other!

Using Spirits

Each spirit you befriend can be 'equipped' to one of your characters, granting them different in-battle abilities. They will also enable actions outside of battles, such as growing vines or healing creatures. Learn about each individual spirit, and work together to overcome all obstacles on your path!

Controls

The game can be played with standard RPG Maker controls (Arrow keys to move, Z/Enter to confirm, X/Esc to cancel and open the Menu). There are no timed elements,  so play at your own pace!

NOTE - The prototype involves one playable area. As this was a demo build, there are references to surveys – please ignore these. There may be bugs or missing features (including one spirit which cannot be befriended in this version).
